name: N-methyl-2-[2-(2-methylphenyl)-2-oxoethyl]-N-phenylbenzamide
source: Karthikeyan M.; Glen R.C.; Bender A. General melting point prediction based on a diverse compound dataset and artificial neural networks. J. Chem. Inf. Model.; 2005; 45(3); 581-2481
Reason: 1-ethylpiperazine base, with a melting point around 106°C, based on the presence of a piperazine ring and a methyl group. The piperazine ring introduces rigidity and hydrogen bonding potential, which can contribute to the melting point. The methyl group introduces a bulky side chain, which can sterically hinder the crystal lattice, raising the melting point by approximately +10°C.
